rules_text:
As Citadel Magistrate enters the battlefield, choose an imperial mandate.
• [b]Excise –[/b] Each player can't draw more than one card each turn.
• [b]Restraint –[/b] Each player can't attack with more than one creature each turn.
• [b]Demarcation –[/b] Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
